Room.Name: Underground Cavern
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a dark, underground cavern beneath the massive glacier.
Room.LongDescription: The glacier appears to be but a few meters deep here as you look up through the ice. Ahead, to the north, you can see the beginning of a rope bridge which crosses over a massive abyss. Unfortunately, it looks like the bridge has been cut, and lies dangling over the edge of the cliff.
